item.title: V D Why?
item.description: Virtual Desktops are a topic that runs hot and cold through the enterprise space. Many enterprises begin pilots and projects in the space before building a clearly defined plan, and these are the environments that need additional remediation down the road. Before we start in with architecture, getting a firm answer to “Why do we need them?” is critical to a successfully scope, cost, and validate the design. This month we will focus on the security use case which is one of the ‘easy wins’ for virtual end user compute.
